Localization.Name: Leyland's Tortoise
Localization.Description: Leyland’s tortoise is a species of tortoise indigenous to Earth (Sol III). Extremely docile, they are kept as pets by Humans, especially long-haul spacers. Over-collection and habitat destruction have made them nearly extinct in the wild.
